data.text: @GeoffHanmer @psvbluemts @takesthecake2 @DrZoeHyde Many of these kids will become #LongCovidKids.
@psvbluemts @rpcounat My grandsons special needs school in northwest sydney has numerous teachers and pupils off with covid, the school was closed on friday and doesnt look like been open monday.

@psvbluemts @takesthecake2 That’s about 14,000 NSW kids under 11 infected in the week ending 28 February. It’s likely that a very high percentage of Public Schools will have infections. How many of them will go on to develop complications or are seriously ill? I’d like to hear @DrZoeHyde thoughts.
@psvbluemts @takesthecake2 A a plot of primary age children's share of the overall COVID-19 positive cases... as far as we know. I can see no reason to trust the official numbers.
